entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
